metadata.title: CVE-2024-26808 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nft_chain_filter: handle NETDEV_UNREGISTER for inet/ingressbasechainRemove netdevice from inet/ingress basechain in case NETDEV_UNREGISTERevent is reported, otherwise a stale reference to netdevice remains inthe hook list.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
